books.author: by Jennette McCurdy
books.description: The actress and filmmaker describes her eating disorders and difficult relationship with her mother.
books.name: I'M GLAD MY MOM DIED

books.author: by Randall Munroe
books.description: The creator of the web comic “xkcd” and former NASA roboticist looks into hypothetical and oddball scenarios.
books.name: WHAT IF? 2

books.author: by Geoffrey Berman
books.description: The former U.S. attorney for the Southern District of New York gives his account of pushing back against the Trump Justice Department.
books.name: HOLDING THE LINE

books.author: by Nina Totenberg
books.description: The NPR legal affairs correspondent details her professional accomplishments and friendship with the late Supreme Court Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg.
books.name: DINNERS WITH RUTH

books.author: by Gabor Maté with Daniel Maté
books.description: The potential ways in which trauma and stress from modern-day living can affect our physical health.
books.name: THE MYTH OF NORMAL

books.author: by Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery.
books.name: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: by Jann S. Wenner
books.description: A memoir by the founder, co-editor and publisher of Rolling Stone magazine.
books.name: LIKE A ROLLING STONE

books.author: by Andy Borowitz
books.description: The creator of “The Borowitz Report” looks at the declining knowledge of some public officials over the last 50 years.
books.name: PROFILES IN IGNORANCE

books.author: by David Corn
books.description: The Washington bureau chief for Mother Jones magazine gives his take on the Republican Party over the last seven decades.
books.name: AMERICAN PSYCHOSIS

books.author: by Buzz Bissinger
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist depicts the service of college football players who served in the Marines during World War II.
books.name: THE MOSQUITO BOWL

books.author: by Jared Kushner
books.description: An account of time spent in the Trump White House by the former president’s son-in-law and senior adviser.
books.name: BREAKING HISTORY

books.author: by Ben Macintyre
books.description: The author of “The Spy and the Traitor” profiles Allied prisoners detained by the German Army in Colditz Castle during World War II.
books.name: PRISONERS OF THE CASTLE

books.author: by Javier Zamora
books.description: The poet describes his journey over two months from El Salvador to the United States to reconnect with his parents who left years earlier.
books.name: SOLITO

books.author: by Tina Brown
books.description: This follow-up to “The Diana Chronicles” details how the royal family reinvented itself after the death of Princess Diana.
books.name: THE PALACE PAPERS

books.author: by Tova Friedman and Malcolm Brabant
books.description: A survivor of Auschwitz describes her childhood during the Holocaust, and her time in a Nazi labor camp and the extermination camp known as Auschwitz-Birkenau.
books.name: THE DAUGHTER OF AUSCHWITZ
